target_audience: teachers and students applying mindset ideas responsibly

refs.content: Introduces fixed vs growth mindsets; emphasizes effort + strategy + help-seeking rather than effort alone.
Average effects of mindset interventions on achievement are small; stronger for at-risk students and when well-designed.
Brief growth mindset intervention improved grades among lower-achieving students in supportive contexts.

special_instructions: Provide classroom scripts focusing on strategies and feedback; warn against 'toxic positivity' and effort-only messages.
